data.message: Implemented hybrid path discovery v2 for InterSphere: Successfully built and deployed: (1) bridge_cache.py with pre-seeded bridges for ~20 common paths, (2) bridge_suggester.py using GPT-4o-mini for bridge suggestions, (3) path_verifier.py for Wikipedia verification, (4) path_discovery_v2.py hybrid orchestrator. Added /path/v2 endpoint. Frontend updated to use v2 by default. Expected performance: cache <50ms, LLM+verify 2-4s (vs v1's 15.5s failure for Music->Africa).
data.task: Implemented hybrid path discovery v2 for InterSphere

Added /path/v2 endpoint. Frontend updated to use v2 by default. Expected performance: cache <50ms, LLM+verify 2-4s (vs v1's 15.5s failure for Music->Africa).
